data.name: Adanto Vanguard
data.oracle_text:
As long as Adanto Vanguard is attacking, it gets +2/+0.
Pay 4 life: Adanto Vanguard gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

data.name: Ashes of the Abhorrent
data.oracle_text:
Players can't cast spells from graveyards or activate abilities of cards in graveyards.
Whenever a creature dies, you gain 1 life.
data.flavor_text: "Let no trace of the vampires' foulness remain."

data.name: Axis of Mortality
data.oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have two target players exchange life totals.
data.flavor_text: The Church of Dusk teaches there is no gain without loss, no triumph without sacrifice, no drink of exquisite crimson without a dying gasp.

data.name: Bellowing Aegisaur
data.oracle_text: Enrage — Whenever Bellowing Aegisaur is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.
data.flavor_text: Its roaring challenge is punctuated by the slam of its tail on the earth, rousing the herds of the plains.

data.name: Bishop of Rebirth
data.oracle_text:
Vigilance
Whenever Bishop of Rebirth attacks, you may return target creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
data.flavor_text: "In the death of the foe lies the resurrection of the faithful."

data.name: Bishop's Soldier
data.oracle_text: Lifelink
data.flavor_text: Vampires, the noble class of old Torrezon, are guided by their dual loyalties to church and crown.

data.name: Bright Reprisal
data.oracle_text:
Destroy target attacking creature.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: Vampires know blood and the systems that carry it. And they know exactly where to strike to set it free.

data.name: Demystify
data.oracle_text: Destroy target enchantment.
data.flavor_text: "The River Heralds carve spells into jade, hoping to steer us from our course. But what right do they have to keep us from that which once was ours?"

data.name: Duskborne Skymarcher
data.oracle_text:
Flying
{W}, {T}: Target attacking Vampire gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "The hour of Dusk is come."

data.name: Emissary of Sunrise
data.oracle_text:
First strike
When Emissary of Sunrise enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

data.name: Encampment Keeper
data.oracle_text:
First strike
{7}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Encampment Keeper: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Paladins of the Sanctum Seeker order are an adventurous lot, venturing into the wilds with monstrous mastiffs at their side.

data.name: Glorifier of Dusk
data.oracle_text:
Pay 2 life: Glorifier of Dusk gains flying until end of turn.
Pay 2 life: Glorifier of Dusk gains vigilance until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "The blood of the enemy is a sacrament. The strength it gives is proof that our cause is just."

data.name: Goring Ceratops
data.oracle_text:
Double strike
Whenever Goring Ceratops attacks, other creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "Follow her footsteps and she will show you the way." —Itzama the Crested

data.name: Imperial Aerosaur
data.oracle_text:
Flying
When Imperial Aerosaur enters the battlefield, another target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Its assistance is unnervingly similar to its hunting technique.

data.name: Imperial Lancer
data.oracle_text: Imperial Lancer has double strike as long as you control a Dinosaur.
data.flavor_text: "Together my mount and I are stronger than either of us apart."

data.name: Inspiring Cleric
data.oracle_text: When Inspiring Cleric enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
data.flavor_text: "The Immortal Sun will bring us true eternal life to replace the everlasting shadow of undeath."

data.name: Ixalan's Binding
data.oracle_text:
When Ixalan's Binding enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Ixalan's Binding leaves the battlefield.
Your opponents can't cast spells with the same name as the exiled card.
data.flavor_text: Jace awoke to the certainty that he was lost.

data.name: Kinjalli's Caller
data.oracle_text: Dinosaur spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
data.flavor_text: The people of the Sun Empire worship the sun in three aspects. Kinjalli is the Wakening Sun, who created humans from clay and baked them in the sun's warmth.

data.name: Kinjalli's Sunwing
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.
data.flavor_text: "There are moments when I feel I could fly like the sunwing. Far away I would soar, but always a golden gale pushes me back." —Huatli

data.name: Legion Conquistador
data.oracle_text: When Legion Conquistador enters the battlefield, you may search your library for any number of cards named Legion Conquistador, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.
data.flavor_text: The Legion of Dusk sailed from Torrezon in search of glory, riches, and the Immortal Sun.

data.name: Legion's Judgment
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
data.flavor_text: "My lance was once wielded by Venerable Tarrian. In his name and by his might, I cast you down!"

data.name: Legion's Landing // Adanto, the First Fort

card_faces.name: Legion's Landing
card_faces.oracle_text:
When Legion's Landing enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.
When you attack with three or more creatures, transform Legion's Landing.
card_faces.flavor_text:
"I claim this land in the name of the queen."
—Adrian Adanto of Lujio

card_faces.name: Adanto, the First Fort
card_faces.oracle_text:
(Transforms from Legion's Landing.)
{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.
{2}{W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

data.name: Looming Altisaur
data.flavor_text: Nature can't be tamed, but the Sun Empire believes that humans are made stronger when they test themselves against the wild strength of the dinosaurs.

data.name: Mavren Fein, Dusk Apostle
data.oracle_text: Whenever one or more nontoken Vampires you control attack, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.
data.flavor_text: In the rapture of his Blood Fast, he destroyed the navigator's tools and steered the ship to shore by faith alone.

data.name: Paladin of the Bloodstained
data.oracle_text: When Paladin of the Bloodstained enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.
data.flavor_text: Closely linked to the Church of Dusk, the paladins of the Bloodstained order are devout to the point of fanaticism.

data.name: Pious Interdiction
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Pious Interdiction enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
data.flavor_text: "Ours is the true and righteous path. You will bow before our might."

data.name: Priest of the Wakening Sun
data.oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may reveal a Dinosaur card from your hand. If you do, you gain 2 life.
{3}{W}{W}, Sacrifice Priest of the Wakening Sun: Search your library for a Dinosaur card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

data.name: Pterodon Knight
data.oracle_text: Pterodon Knight has flying as long as you control a Dinosaur.
data.flavor_text: "To rise like the sun—there is no greater feeling."

data.name: Queen's Commission
data.oracle_text: Create two 1/1 white Vampire creature tokens with lifelink.
data.flavor_text: "Let the blood of the impure flow through you. Only the blessings of the golden city will purge its acrid taste from your mouth." —High Marshal Arguel

data.name: Rallying Roar
data.oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Untap them.
data.flavor_text: "The sun's strength sings in our hearts! I have never been more proud of my home and my people." —Huatli

data.name: Raptor Companion
data.flavor_text: A raptor will follow any order as long as that order is "hunt," "kill," or "go for the guts."

data.name: Ritual of Rejuvenation
data.oracle_text:
You gain 4 life.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: "Nothing is more sacred than the gift of blood. Blessed are the vein that empties and the heart that is renewed."

data.name: Sanguine Sacrament
data.oracle_text: You gain twice X life. Put Sanguine Sacrament on the bottom of its owner's library.
data.flavor_text: "As the sun sets to make way for dawn, so we turn to darkness to bring about the coming salvation."

data.name: Settle the Wreckage
data.oracle_text: Exile all attacking creatures target player controls. That player may search his or her library for that many basic land cards, put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle his or her library.

data.name: Sheltering Light
data.oracle_text: Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. Scry 1. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy the creature.)
data.flavor_text: Those who wield the power of the sun protect the Empire from darkness.

data.name: Shining Aerosaur
data.oracle_text: Flying
data.flavor_text: "The invaders cloak themselves in the shadows of dusk. Aerosaurs hide in the brilliance of the noonday sun." —Caparocti Sunborn

data.name: Skyblade of the Legion
data.oracle_text: Flying
data.flavor_text: Vampires call the gift of flight "exultation." For their enemies, it brings only sorrow.

data.name: Slash of Talons
data.oracle_text: Slash of Talons deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
data.flavor_text: "The amber sun smokes with fury, gazing on foes that gather like ants invading our home. We are ready! Blade and claw strike as one." —Huatli

data.name: Steadfast Armasaur
data.oracle_text:
Vigilance
{1}{W}, {T}: Steadfast Armasaur deals damage equal to its toughness to target creature blocking or blocked by it.
data.flavor_text: "Like the mighty armasaur, we will defend against all who invade our shores." —Itzama the Crested

data.name: Sunrise Seeker
data.oracle_text:
Vigilance
When Sunrise Seeker enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

data.name: Territorial Hammerskull
data.oracle_text: Whenever Territorial Hammerskull attacks, tap target creature an opponent controls.
data.flavor_text: From the eyes up, it's solid bone and stubbornness.

data.name: Tocatli Honor Guard
data.oracle_text: Creatures entering the battlefield don't cause abilities to trigger.
data.flavor_text: The glorious city of Pachatupa is the center of the Sun Empire, and Tocatli, the emperor's palace, is its glowing heart.

data.name: Vampire's Zeal
data.oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it's a Vampire, it gains first strike until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: The Feast of Blood sends new life essence flowing through the vampire who partakes, manifesting as even greater strength and speed.

data.name: Wakening Sun's Avatar
data.oracle_text: When Wakening Sun's Avatar enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, destroy all non-Dinosaur creatures.
data.flavor_text: "Kinjalli's encompassing rays herald new life in the moment of the sun's dawning." —Chitlati, Lightning Rider

data.name: Air Elemental
data.oracle_text: Flying
data.flavor_text: As the ship approached, the jade totem rose high overhead. Power rippled. Eyes of stone glowed and crackled. Out hissed a breath of the world, and a windstorm came alive.

data.name: Arcane Adaptation
data.oracle_text:
As Arcane Adaptation enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creatures you control are the chosen type in addition to their other types. The same is true for creature spells you control and creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield.

data.name: Cancel
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell.
data.flavor_text: "Hold your fire, obviously." —Captain Brandis Thorn

data.name: Chart a Course
data.oracle_text: Draw two cards. Then discard a card unless you attacked with a creature this turn.
data.flavor_text: While other pirates prowl for treasure, Captain Parrish plunders secrets.

data.name: Daring Saboteur
data.oracle_text:
{2}{U}: Daring Saboteur can't be blocked this turn.
Whenever Daring Saboteur deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
data.flavor_text: "They'll never see me coming."

data.name: Deadeye Quartermaster
data.oracle_text: When Deadeye Quartermaster enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Equipment or Vehicle card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
data.flavor_text: "Welcome aboard, mate! You're going to need this."

data.name: Deeproot Waters
data.oracle_text: Whenever you cast a Merfolk spell, create a 1/1 blue Merfolk creature token with hexproof. (A creature with hexproof can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
data.flavor_text: A visit to the Deeproot Tree and its ancient spring replenishes a merfolk's connection to nature.

data.name: Depths of Desire
data.oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
data.flavor_text: Pockets full of gold, lungs full of brine.

data.name: Dive Down
data.oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +0/+3 and gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
data.flavor_text: "Seeing the river is not the same as seeing the fish."

data.name: Dreamcaller Siren
data.oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
Dreamcaller Siren can block only creatures with flying.
When Dreamcaller Siren enters the battlefield, if you control another Pirate, tap up to two target nonland permanents.

data.name: Entrancing Melody
data.oracle_text: Gain control of target creature with converted mana cost X.
data.flavor_text: The stronger the will, the more bewitching the song.

data.name: Favorable Winds
data.oracle_text: Creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.
data.flavor_text: "Like ribbons of wind and wisdom the coatls fly, twisting mystery into truth, shaping the clouds to suit their inscrutable will." —Huatli

data.name: Fleet Swallower
data.oracle_text: Whenever Fleet Swallower attacks, target player puts the top half of his or her library, rounded up, into his or her graveyard.
data.flavor_text: "Captain, I think that island is following us."

data.name: Headwater Sentries
data.flavor_text: "The elders say that if the intruders discovered the secret of the golden city, it would mean an end to our people."

data.name: Herald of Secret Streams
data.oracle_text: Creatures you control with +1/+1 counters on them can't be blocked.
data.flavor_text: "You might as well try to stop the waterfall."

data.name: Jace, Cunning Castaway
data.oracle_text:
+1: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player this turn, draw a card, then discard a card.
−2: Create a 2/2 blue Illusion creature token with "When this creature becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it."
−5: Create two tokens that are copies of Jace, Cunning Castaway, except they're not legendary.

data.name: Kopala, Warden of Waves
data.oracle_text:
Spells your opponents cast that target a Merfolk you control cost {2} more to cast.
Abilities your opponents activate that target a Merfolk you control cost {2} more to activate.
data.flavor_text: "I know these waters better than you know yourselves."

data.name: Lookout's Dispersal
data.oracle_text:
Lookout's Dispersal costs {1} less to cast if you control a Pirate.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}.
data.flavor_text: Her song plucks the strings of the storm, shifting wind and storm into a harmony that will carry her ship to safety.

data.name: Navigator's Ruin
data.oracle_text: Raid — At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked with a creature this turn, target opponent puts the top four cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
data.flavor_text: "You won't be needing this. Or this. Or these . . ."

data.name: One With the Wind
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.
data.flavor_text: "River and sea, jungle and sky. Water flows freely between the two halves of the world. We are creatures of the water." —Shaper Tuvasa

data.name: Opt
data.oracle_text:
Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: "It's easy to anticipate Captain Storm's orders: take the more dangerous route."

data.name: Overflowing Insight
data.oracle_text: Target player draws seven cards.
data.flavor_text: The truth came to Kumena like the Great River's torrent: the only way to keep his enemies away from the hidden city was to claim its power for himself.

data.name: Perilous Voyage
data.oracle_text: Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand. If its converted mana cost was 2 or less, scry 2.
data.flavor_text: For the first time in her life, Vraska tried to prevent death.

data.name: Pirate's Prize
data.oracle_text: Draw two cards. Create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
data.flavor_text: Nothing warms the heart like plunder.

data.name: Prosperous Pirates
data.oracle_text: When Prosperous Pirates enters the battlefield, create two colorless Treasure artifact tokens with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
data.flavor_text: The floating city of High and Dry hasn't yet sunk under the weight of gold, but it's not for want of trying.

data.name: River Sneak
data.oracle_text:
River Sneak can't be blocked.
Whenever another Merfolk enters the battlefield under your control, River Sneak gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: No ripples, no splashes, no warning.

data.name: River's Rebuke
data.oracle_text: Return all nonland permanents target player controls to their owner's hand.
data.flavor_text: Carefully following the thaumatic compass Bolas had given her, Vraska blundered straight into the River Heralds' trap.

data.name: Run Aground
data.oracle_text: Put target artifact or creature on top of its owner's library.
data.flavor_text: "That's the first time I've seen the ground do the running." —Captain Brinely Rage

data.name: Sailor of Means
data.oracle_text: When Sailor of Means enters the battlefield, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
data.flavor_text: In the Brazen Coalition, the wheels of business are greased with plunder.

data.name: Search for Azcanta // Azcanta, the Sunken Ruin

card_faces.name: Search for Azcanta
card_faces.oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard. Then if you have seven or more cards in your graveyard, you may transform Search for Azcanta.
card_faces.flavor_text: The Sunken Ruin houses all the learning of a long-forgotten age.

card_faces.name: Azcanta, the Sunken Ruin
card_faces.oracle_text:
(Transforms from Search for Azcanta.)
{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.
{2}{U}, {T}: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a noncreature, nonland card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

data.name: Shaper Apprentice
data.oracle_text: Shaper Apprentice has flying as long as you control another Merfolk.
data.flavor_text: The River Heralds would wreck a thousand ships to keep intruders from finding the golden city.

data.name: Shipwreck Looter
data.oracle_text: Raid — When Shipwreck Looter enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
data.flavor_text: One pirate's wreck is another's reward.

data.name: Shore Keeper
data.oracle_text: {7}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Shore Keeper: Draw three cards.
data.flavor_text: Over their long life spans, the larger trilobites accumulate vast treasure troves in their guts.

data.name: Siren Lookout
data.oracle_text:
Flying
When Siren Lookout enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

data.name: Siren Stormtamer
data.oracle_text:
Flying
{U}, Sacrifice Siren Stormtamer: Counter target spell or ability that targets you or a creature you control.
data.flavor_text: He's the calm that hides the coming storm.

data.name: Siren's Ruse
data.oracle_text: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If a Pirate was exiled this way, draw a card.
data.flavor_text: Deception and misdirection are the heart of the pirate's arsenal.

data.name: Spell Pierce
data.oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
data.flavor_text: "A fool's fire is quickly quenched." —Shaper Kumena

data.name: Spell Swindle
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell. Create X colorless Treasure artifact tokens, where X is that spell's converted mana cost. They have "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

data.name: Storm Fleet Aerialist
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Raid — Storm Fleet Aerialist enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked with a creature this turn.
data.flavor_text: "Only one thing beats the freedom of the sea: the freedom of the sky."

data.name: Storm Fleet Spy
data.oracle_text: Raid — When Storm Fleet Spy enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, draw a card.
data.flavor_text: "They're searching in the same direction we are. And for the same thing, I'll wager."

data.name: Storm Sculptor
data.oracle_text:
Storm Sculptor can't be blocked.
When Storm Sculptor enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.
data.flavor_text: In his hands, the wind can become a weapon or a means of escape.

data.name: Tempest Caller
data.oracle_text: When Tempest Caller enters the battlefield, tap all creatures target opponent controls.
data.flavor_text: "I am the storm."

data.name: Watertrap Weaver
data.oracle_text: When Watertrap Weaver enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
data.flavor_text: The river is a powerful friend.

data.name: Wind Strider
data.oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
data.flavor_text: "Currents are currents, whether in sea or sky."

data.name: Anointed Deacon
data.oracle_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target Vampire get +2/+0 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Inspiration is red as rubies, flowing like honeyed wine.

data.name: Arguel's Blood Fast // Temple of Aclazotz

card_faces.name: Arguel's Blood Fast
card_faces.oracle_text:
{1}{B}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 5 or less life, you may transform Arguel's Blood Fast.
card_faces.flavor_text: Arguel's vision led him into the jungles of Ixalan . . .

card_faces.name: Temple of Aclazotz
card_faces.oracle_text:
(Transforms from Arguel's Blood Fast.)
{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.
card_faces.flavor_text: . . . to the lost temple of a bat-god of night, eternal enemy to the Threefold Sun.

data.name: Bishop of the Bloodstained
data.oracle_text: When Bishop of the Bloodstained enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 1 life for each Vampire you control.
data.flavor_text: "They shall give us all they have as penance for their resistance. Their ships. Their goods. Their rebellious blood."

data.name: Blight Keeper
data.oracle_text:
Flying
{7}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Blight Keeper: Target opponent loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.
data.flavor_text: It withers fruit and flesh alike.

data.name: Bloodcrazed Paladin
data.oracle_text:
Flash
Bloodcrazed Paladin enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature that died this turn.
data.flavor_text: When a paladin undertaking the Blood Fast finally gives in to hunger, the violence is sudden, explosive, and complete.

data.name: Boneyard Parley
data.oracle_text: Exile up to five target creature cards from graveyards. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put all cards from the pile of your choice onto the battlefield under your control and the rest into their owners' graveyards.

data.name: Contract Killing
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Create two colorless Treasure artifact tokens with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
data.flavor_text: For a price, the floating city of High and Dry offers all the amenities a pirate could want: rest, recreation, and revenge.

data.name: Costly Plunder
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast Costly Plunder, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Draw two cards.
data.flavor_text: No lock of iron is a match for Vraska's will of stone.

data.name: Dark Nourishment
data.oracle_text: Dark Nourishment deals 3 damage to target creature or player. You gain 3 life.
data.flavor_text: Demons lurk in the shadows of ancient ruins, spreading plague and corruption across the land.

data.name: Deadeye Tormentor
data.oracle_text: Raid — When Deadeye Tormentor enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, target opponent discards a card.
data.flavor_text: Despite their noble heritage, the pirates of the Deadeye Fleet are known for underhanded tactics and despicable trickery.

data.name: Deadeye Tracker
data.oracle_text: {1}{B}, {T}: Exile two target cards from an opponent's graveyard. Deadeye Tracker explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

data.name: Deathless Ancient
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Tap three untapped Vampires you control: Return Deathless Ancient from your graveyard to your hand.
data.flavor_text: "Ancient one, we have reached the promised shore. The Immortal Sun is near. Drink and awake."

data.name: Desperate Castaways
data.oracle_text: Desperate Castaways can't attack unless you control an artifact.
data.flavor_text: A pirate crew without a ship is a crew that will do anything to get one.

data.name: Dire Fleet Hoarder
data.oracle_text: When Dire Fleet Hoarder dies, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
data.flavor_text: Among the pirates of the Brazen Coalition, the only thing more dangerous than failure is success.

data.name: Dire Fleet Interloper
data.oracle_text:
Menace
When Dire Fleet Interloper enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

data.name: Dire Fleet Ravager
data.oracle_text:
Menace, deathtouch
When Dire Fleet Ravager enters the battlefield, each player loses a third of his or her life, rounded up.
data.flavor_text: His fists fume with the decay of death, each strike a plague on the hearts of his enemies.

data.name: Duress
data.oracle_text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
data.flavor_text: Solitude and starvation are brutal punishments, but even worse is all that time to think.

data.name: Fathom Fleet Captain
data.oracle_text:
Menace
Whenever Fathom Fleet Captain attacks, if you control another nontoken Pirate, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a 2/2 black Pirate creature token with menace.
data.flavor_text: "Join me, and take the world for yourself!"

data.name: Fathom Fleet Cutthroat
data.oracle_text: When Fathom Fleet Cutthroat enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls that was dealt damage this turn.
data.flavor_text: "It was a bad evening for you, mate. Now it's chow time for the sharks."

data.name: Grim Captain's Call
data.oracle_text: Return a Pirate card from your graveyard to your hand, then do the same for Vampire, Dinosaur, and Merfolk.
data.flavor_text: When the battle is over, the bitterest foes at last find common ground.

data.name: Heartless Pillage
data.oracle_text:
Target opponent discards two cards.
Raid — If you attacked with a creature this turn, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

data.name: Kitesail Freebooter
data.oracle_text:
Flying
When Kitesail Freebooter enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. Exile that card until Kitesail Freebooter leaves the battlefield.

data.name: Lurking Chupacabra
data.oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control explores, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "Shadow birthed it. The moon gave it eyes, and the jungle gave it teeth. But it was Death that taught it cruelty." —Huatli

data.name: March of the Drowned
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return two target Pirate cards from your graveyard to your hand.

data.name: Mark of the Vampire
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink.
data.flavor_text: "Through your sacrifice of self, you become holy. Through your strength, all will be saved." —From the Rite of Redemption

data.name: Queen's Agent
data.oracle_text:
Lifelink
When Queen's Agent enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

data.name: Queen's Bay Soldier
data.flavor_text: The soldiers of the Legion of Dusk have come to the colonies at Queen's Bay in search of glory and riches. They are veterans of centuries of warfare, and they thirst for conquest.

data.name: Raiders' Wake
data.oracle_text:
Whenever an opponent discards a card, that player loses 2 life.
Raid — At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked with a creature this turn, target opponent discards a card.
data.flavor_text: One was spared to tell the gruesome tale.

data.name: Revel in Riches
data.oracle_text:
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control ten or more Treasures, you win the game.

data.name: Ruin Raider
data.oracle_text: Raid — At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked with a creature this turn, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to the card's converted mana cost.

data.name: Ruthless Knave
data.oracle_text:
{2}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Create two colorless Treasure artifact tokens with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
Sacrifice three Treasures: Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: "This scum is barely worth the trouble."

data.name: Sanctum Seeker
data.oracle_text: Whenever a Vampire you control attacks, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
data.flavor_text: The Sanctum Seekers were the first of the knightly orders to cross the sea and are still the most zealous.

data.name: Seekers' Squire
data.oracle_text: When Seekers' Squire enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)
data.flavor_text: Dusk follows the light.

data.name: Skittering Heartstopper
data.oracle_text: {B}: Skittering Heartstopper gains deathtouch until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: It flows like water over the forest floor, as deadly as the swiftest current.

data.name: Skulduggery
data.oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature you control gets +1/+1 and target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1.
data.flavor_text: "They're so much more willing to parley once they're hanging from a boom by the ankle!"

data.name: Skymarch Bloodletter
data.oracle_text:
Flying
When Skymarch Bloodletter enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
data.flavor_text: From the perpetual shadowsmoke that hung above the ship, a silent form emerged, lips curled with malice and anticipation.

data.name: Spreading Rot
data.oracle_text: Destroy target land. Its controller loses 2 life.
data.flavor_text: "What is this foul presence that defies the sun's cleansing rays?" —Itzama the Crested

data.name: Sword-Point Diplomacy
data.oracle_text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. For each of those cards, put that card into your hand unless any opponent pays 3 life. Then exile the rest.
data.flavor_text: "Take my blood if you want. Just don't take my gold!"

data.name: Vanquish the Weak
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.
data.flavor_text: The clerics known as condemners punish those who do not recognize the righteous authority of the church.

data.name: Vicious Conquistador
data.oracle_text: Whenever Vicious Conquistador attacks, each opponent loses 1 life.
data.flavor_text: "He is ambitious. Tireless. And utterly ruthless. Ideal for the frontier." —Viceroy Elia Sotonores, report to the queen

data.name: Vraska's Contempt
data.oracle_text: Exile target creature or planeswalker. You gain 2 life.
data.flavor_text: It wasn't long before the taverns of High and Dry were full of whispers about the new captain who could turn a person to stone with a glance.

data.name: Walk the Plank
data.oracle_text: Destroy target non-Merfolk creature.
data.flavor_text: When Captain Thorn adds a new ship to his fleet, he gives the crew a simple choice: follow me, or fall in the sea.

data.name: Wanted Scoundrels
data.oracle_text: When Wanted Scoundrels dies, target opponent creates two colorless Treasure artifact tokens with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
data.flavor_text: "Trust me. The reward's not worth it."

data.name: Angrath's Marauders
data.oracle_text: If a source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.
data.flavor_text: Captain Angrath cares less about treasure than mayhem. If he can't leave Ixalan, he'll burn the plane down.

data.name: Bonded Horncrest
data.oracle_text: Bonded Horncrest can't attack or block alone.
data.flavor_text: "You don't tame a horncrest. You convince it that it's easier to destroy something else." —Amautl, knight of Atzocan

data.name: Brazen Buccaneers
data.oracle_text:
Haste
When Brazen Buccaneers enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

data.name: Burning Sun's Avatar
data.oracle_text: When Burning Sun's Avatar enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target opponent and 3 damage to up to one target creature.
data.flavor_text:
"Tilonalli's searing rays carry the spark of life's eventual destruction as all light fades."
—Chitlati, Lightning Rider

data.name: Captain Lannery Storm
data.oracle_text:
Haste
Whenever Captain Lannery Storm attacks, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
Whenever you sacrifice a Treasure, Captain Lannery Storm gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

data.name: Captivating Crew
data.oracle_text: {3}{R}: Gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
data.flavor_text: "We sail. We plunder. Then we dance."

data.name: Charging Monstrosaur
data.oracle_text: Trample, haste
data.flavor_text: "I knew I should have stayed with the boat. Always stay with the boat!"

data.name: Demolish
data.oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or land.
data.flavor_text: What took months for human hands to carve took just seconds for the dinosaur's tail to ruin.

data.name: Dinosaur Stampede
data.oracle_text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn. Dinosaurs you control gain trample until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: If you're in the way of a ceratops charge and you're made of mere flesh and bone, then you're not really in the way.

data.name: Dual Shot
data.oracle_text: Dual Shot deals 1 damage to each of up to two target creatures.
data.flavor_text: "Through me the rage of Tilonalli burns twice as bright."

data.name: Fathom Fleet Firebrand
data.oracle_text: {1}{R}: Fathom Fleet Firebrand gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: As she charges into battle, her arcane tattoos stir and crawl like fiery serpents.

data.name: Fiery Cannonade
data.oracle_text: Fiery Cannonade deals 2 damage to each non-Pirate creature.
data.flavor_text: Wary of the ferocious dinosaurs, the Legion of Dusk built up the walls of their fort—just in time for the pirates to burn them down.

data.name: Fire Shrine Keeper
data.oracle_text:
Menace
{7}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Fire Shrine Keeper: It deals 3 damage to each of up to two target creatures.
data.flavor_text: Though grimed with the dust of centuries, the ancient shrine was not unguarded.

data.name: Firecannon Blast
data.oracle_text:
Firecannon Blast deals 3 damage to target creature.
Raid — Firecannon Blast deals 6 damage to that creature instead if you attacked with a creature this turn.
data.flavor_text: Goblins' fearlessness and diminutive size make them the perfect cannoneers.

data.name: Frenzied Raptor
data.flavor_text: Sun Empire warriors are taught to emulate the fearless raptors that fling themselves against towers of horn and muscle a hundred times their size.

data.name: Headstrong Brute
data.oracle_text:
Headstrong Brute can't block.
Headstrong Brute has menace as long as you control another Pirate.
data.flavor_text: "Watch your backs, keep your blades at hand, and let the orc go first!" —Captain Brandis Thorn

data.name: Hijack
data.oracle_text: Gain control of target artifact or creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Trapped on Ixalan, the Planeswalker Angrath is the only minotaur sailing the seas. No matter how many ships he captures, he cannot break free.

data.name: Lightning Strike
data.oracle_text: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
data.flavor_text: "Storm on the horizon, cap'n!" —Grick Doobin, last words

data.name: Lightning-Rig Crew
data.oracle_text:
{T}: Lightning-Rig Crew deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever you cast a Pirate spell, untap Lightning-Rig Crew.
data.flavor_text: A pirate ship in battle is a storm of activity.

data.name: Makeshift Munitions
data.oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Makeshift Munitions deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
data.flavor_text: "Grease up a firecannon good and proper with dinosaur-liver oil, and it'll shoot just about anything."

data.name: Nest Robber
data.oracle_text: Haste
data.flavor_text: "These sailors on our shores are like the dinosaurs that plunder eggs from nests. They live on the labors of others." —Itzama the Crested

data.name: Otepec Huntmaster
data.oracle_text:
Dinosaur spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
{T}: Target Dinosaur gains haste until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "Forward! Let the Burning Sun's light guide you to deserving prey!"

data.name: Rampaging Ferocidon
data.oracle_text:
Menace
Players can't gain life.
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, Rampaging Ferocidon deals 1 damage to that creature's controller.
data.flavor_text: All raptors are aggressive, but ferocidons seem to enjoy their prey's pain.

data.name: Raptor Hatchling
data.oracle_text: Enrage — Whenever Raptor Hatchling is dealt damage, create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.
data.flavor_text: "Every little hatchling has a parent's claws to guard it." —Sun Empire saying

data.name: Repeating Barrage
data.oracle_text:
Repeating Barrage deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
Raid — {3}{R}{R}: Return Repeating Barrage from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only if you attacked with a creature this turn.

data.name: Rigging Runner
data.oracle_text:
First strike
Raid — Rigging Runner enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked with a creature this turn.
data.flavor_text: The hook makes him feel brave, and the hat makes him feel fancy.

data.name: Rile
data.oracle_text:
Rile deals 1 damage to target creature you control. That creature gains trample until end of turn.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: The enormous can still be at the mercy of the small.

data.name: Rowdy Crew
data.oracle_text:
Trample
When Rowdy Crew enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then discard two cards at random. If two cards that share a card type are discarded this way, put two +1/+1 counters on Rowdy Crew.

data.name: Rummaging Goblin
data.oracle_text: {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: Goblins' eager curiosity leads them to scavenging, petty theft, and the rigging of sleek pirate ships. Some stop at scavenging.

data.name: Star of Extinction
data.oracle_text: Destroy target land. Star of Extinction deals 20 damage to each creature and each planeswalker.
data.flavor_text: "The visions haunt me. I see the end of the world, brought on by the search for the Immortal Sun." —Shaper Pashona

data.name: Storm Fleet Arsonist
data.oracle_text: Raid — When Storm Fleet Arsonist enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, target opponent sacrifices a permanent.
data.flavor_text: "Go ahead, build another. I'll burn that down as well."

data.name: Storm Fleet Pyromancer
data.oracle_text: Raid — When Storm Fleet Pyromancer enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, Storm Fleet Pyromancer deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

data.name: Sun-Crowned Hunters
data.oracle_text: Enrage — Whenever Sun-Crowned Hunters is dealt damage, it deals 3 damage to target opponent.
data.flavor_text: One alone is dangerous, and they are never alone.

data.name: Sunbird's Invocation
data.oracle_text: Whenever you cast a spell from your hand, reveal the top X cards of your library, where X is that spell's converted mana cost. You may cast a card revealed this way with converted mana cost X or less without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

data.name: Sure Strike
data.oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "Everyone has a weak spot."

data.name: Swashbuckling
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has haste.
data.flavor_text: The pirates of the Brazen Coalition are the descendants of those displaced by the Legion of Dusk, and they are eager for vengeance.

data.name: Thrash of Raptors
data.oracle_text: As long as you control another Dinosaur, Thrash of Raptors gets +2/+0 and has trample.
data.flavor_text: They glide through the undergrowth, drawn to sounds of disturbance. They attack in unison and all share in the kill. And then they move on.

data.name: Tilonalli's Knight
data.oracle_text: Whenever Tilonalli's Knight attacks, if you control a Dinosaur, Tilonalli's Knight gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: The people of the Sun Empire worship the sun in three aspects. Tilonalli is the Burning Sun, associated with ferocity, fire, and passion.

data.name: Tilonalli's Skinshifter
data.oracle_text:
Haste
Whenever Tilonalli's Skinshifter attacks, it becomes a copy of another target nonlegendary attacking creature until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "I am the ferocity of the Burning Sun. I am hide and feather, fang and claw."

data.name: Trove of Temptation
data.oracle_text:
Each opponent must attack you or a planeswalker you control with at least one creature each combat if able.
At the beginning of your end step, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

data.name: Unfriendly Fire
data.oracle_text: Unfriendly Fire deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
data.flavor_text: Disputes within the Brazen Coalition can escalate from insult to broadside in the blink of an eye.

card_faces.name: Vance's Blasting Cannons
card_faces.oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. If it's a nonland card, you may cast that card this turn.
Whenever you cast your third spell in a turn, you may transform Vance's Blasting Cannons.
card_faces.flavor_text: With a broadside assault, Captain Vance carved the cliffs to form her new home.

card_faces.name: Spitfire Bastion
card_faces.oracle_text:
(Transforms from Vance's Blasting Cannons.)
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.
{2}{R}, {T}: Spitfire Bastion deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
card_faces.flavor_text: Now instead of a ship, Ripley Vance commands a fortress.

data.name: Wily Goblin
data.oracle_text: When Wily Goblin enters the battlefield, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
data.flavor_text: Goblins climb and swing with ease, whether through a pirate ship's rigging or a tree's branches.

data.name: Ancient Brontodon
data.flavor_text: It is taller than all but the tallest trees, and older than all but the oldest.
